Headline: Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: 146 buses temp rerouted NB via Michigan, LSDr, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan, LSDr; SB LSDr, LSD West, Cannon, Flrtn, Stockton, LaSalle, LSDr & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to roadway conditions from severe weather:

  • Northbound buses are rerouted via Michigan, Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan and Lake Shore Drive.
  • Southbound buses are rerouted via Foster, Marine, Lake Shore Drive, Lake Shore Drive West, Cannon, Fullerton, Stockton, LaSalle, Lake Shore Drive and Michigan. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: 147 buses temp rerouted NB via Michigan, Inner, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan, LSDr; SB Inner, LSD West, Cannon, Flrtn, Stockton, LaSalle, Inner, Mich.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to roadway conditions from severe weather.

  • Northbound buses are rerouted via Michigan, Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan, and Lake Shore Drive.
  • Southbound buses are rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Lake Shore Drive West, Cannon, Fullerton, Stockton, LaSalle, Lake Shore Drive and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
